issues.description: The method `singFarmSong` is declared in the UML (problem statement) and in the template with a `void` return type, but in the solution repository it is defined to return a `String`. This public API mismatch will prevent students from correctly implementing and testing the method as specified.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the return type of `singFarmSong` in the solution repository back to `void` and perform printing inside the method to align with the UML and the template.
